title: Google Spreadsheet to HTML - Variant with Spreadsheet File
author: Tom
workflow_json: {"nodes":[{"name":"Read from Google Sheets","type":"n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets","position":[460,300],"parameters":{"options":{},"sheetId":"1uFISwZJ1rzkOnOSNocX-_n-ASSAznWGdpcPK3_KCvVo"},"credentials":{"googleSheetsOAuth2Api":{"id":"19","name":"Tom's Google Sheets account"}},"typeVersion":2},{"name":"Create HTML file","type":"n8n-nodes-base.spreadsheetFile","position":[680,300],"parameters":{"options":{},"operation":"toFile","fileFormat":"html"},"typeVersion":1},{"name":"Webhook","type":"n8n-nodes-base.webhook","position":[240,300],"webhookId":"08569699-fea2-4856-80aa-fe878ab9dd4f","parameters":{"path":"08569699-fea2-4856-80aa-fe878ab9dd4f","options":{},"responseData":"firstEntryBinary","responseMode":"lastNode"},"typeVersion":1}],"connections":{"Webhook":{"main":[[{"node":"Read from Google Sheets","type":"main","index":0}]]},"Read from Google Sheets":{"main":[[{"node":"Create HTML file","type":"main","index":0}]]}}}
readme:
This workflow shows a no code approach to creating a HTML table based on Google Sheets data.

![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_352c24d418.png)

To run the workflow:

  1. Make sure you have a Google Sheet with a header row and some data in it.
  2. Grab your sheet ID:  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_bd07bc6557.png)
  3. Add it to the Google Sheets node:  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_491e174251.png)
  4. Activate the workflow or execute it manually
  5. Visit the URL provided by the webhook node in your browser (_production URL_ if the workflow is active, _test URL_ if the workflow is executed manually)
readme_zh:
本工作流演示了无需编写代码即可基于Google表格数据创建HTML表格的方法。

![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_352c24d418.png)

运行工作流步骤：

1. 确保您的Google表格已设置标题行并包含数据  
2. 获取表格ID：  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_bd07bc6557.png)  
3. 将ID填入Google表格节点：  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_491e174251.png)  
4. 激活工作流或手动执行  
5. 在浏览器访问webhook节点提供的URL（激活状态使用生产环境URL，手动执行使用测试URL）
title_zh: Google 表格转 HTML - 带表格文件版本
